mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_no, reply_content, reply_origin, reply_member_no, reply_time) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{replyContent}, #{replyOrigin}, #{replyMemberNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.*, m.member_nick from reply r join member m on r.reply_member_no = m.member_no where r.reply_origin = #{replyOrigin} order by r.reply_no asc
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{replyContent} where reply_no=#{replyNo}
